ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported
e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Which of the following statements best describes how many people know about your mental health problem?
Notes: 0 = It's completely hidden, almost nobody knows about it; 1 = It's mostly hidden, a few people know about my mental health problem, but most don't know; 2 = It's mostly out in the open, most people know about my mental health problem, but some don't know; 3 = It's completely out in the open, almost everyone knows about my mental health problem

ElementDescription: How comfortable you are disclosing your status as a person who has a mental health problem:  To family?
Notes: 0 = Not at all comfortable; 4 = Completely comfortable

ElementDescription: How comfortable you are disclosing your status as a person who has a mental health problem: To friends?
Notes: 0 = Not at all comfortable; 4 = Completely comfortable

ElementDescription: How comfortable you are disclosing your status as a person who has a mental health problem: To co-workers?
Notes: 0 = Not at all comfortable; 4 = Completely comfortable

ElementDescription: How comfortable you are disclosing your status as a person who has a mental health problem: To someone you're meeting for the first time?
Notes: 0 = Not at all comfortable; 4 = Completely comfortable

ElementDescription: How comfortable you are disclosing your status as a person who has a mental health problem: In a public setting (for example, at a community event)?
Notes: 0 = Not at all comfortable; 4 = Completely comfortable

ElementDescription: How comfortable you are disclosing your status as a person who has a mental health problem: In the media (for example, a newspaper article)?
Notes: 0 = Not at all comfortable; 4 = Completely comfortable
